=======
CHANGES
=======

3.4.0 (2007-10-25)
------------------

* Folded the i18nextract script into ``zope.app.locales.extract`` and
  exposed it as a console script entry point.

3.4.0a1 (2007-04-22)
--------------------

* Initial release as a separate project, corresponds to ``zope.app.locales``
  from Zope 3.4.0a1
